tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Nine months of pregnancy felt like a breeze, thanks to the outstanding efforts of everyone at Fortis lafemme specially Dr. Anita Gupta. I was very anxious patient and had done my research well before choosing Dr. Anita Gupta as my gynaecologist. Right from very first visit, I was very happy to have chosen Dr. Anita Gupta. The right amount of information at the right amount of time kept us at ease and relaxed, which was very important to us. Just the required tests and visits to make sure mom and baby were doing well. The modern and up-to-date practices made the whole experience enjoyable. And the best part was she was always a text away for all queries even at the odd hours. When it came to surgery, the care of Dr. Anita Gupta and Her team was the best of all. The  surgery was flawless and she brought us our little angel. I could not have asked for more. I would rate my experience with Dr. Anita Gupta at 20 on a scale of 10. I wish I had the words to thank her for an amazing birth experience. I‚Äôm indebted for life.
I would also like to mention the excellent quality and caring nature of all nurses. I have been working in the hospital industry for over a decade and I wouldn‚Äôt be bragging if I say nurses at fortis lafemme are an epitome of Nursing care,true to their profession. Right after admission, preparation for the OT and finally helping the new mother and handling the new born with the utmost care they will do it all with a smile. 
Overall , a great experience, i feel lucky and healthy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Gynae Problems,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Family Planning,
review:
Dr. Anita Gupta was recommended to us by Google ** *** **** ** ** *** **** ************* ** ****** ** ***** ** *** ** *** ******* ** * I started visiting her a year back as me and my husband were trying to conceive through natural process. She was very professional and explained why it is important to get a checkup done before we start trying. We conceived through natural process with her guidance and booster medications. The pregnancy had some initial jitters but she always encouraged us to have a positive outlook and take ample bed rest. After initial couple of months, the pregnancy was stable and she was always available for any of our queries even in odd hours. I bothered her a lot with lots of first time parents questions and she was very patient and professional with us. Finally she delivered my baby girl, completely healthy, through c-section and the surgery was flawless. I recuperated as per the process and the hospital staff was also very friendly with us during the testing corona times as well. Also, she never asked us to get extra tests or ultrasounds done as most of the doctors in this time and age suggest. We had our regular tests in every trimester of the pregnancy and only the important USG scans.
I recommend Dr. Anita Gupta to every couple who is trying to bring a baby in this world as I liked her working methods which were neither too conventional nor too modern. We asked for results and she delivered. Her skill and experience reflect completely in her work. Thats what we ask for a gynaecologist. :)
Strongly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
******** ***** *** ** *** ** *** **** ****** * *** **** ** ** ****.This is my wife's second delivery done by Dr .Anita gupta mam  and after suffering from covid 19 , it seems like we have to go for c - section delivery as my wife is having so much breathing problem but all things under her guidance goes so well that we can't even think of.And finally normal delivery is performed.All our queries are cleared by her very well , while on call our while visiting hospital.She gives best to her patient .No extra test and ultrasound are suggested by her.Our early pre term delivery is converted to late pre term delivery which is done in 36 weeks by her under her guidance.

I recommend every couple to once visit Dr .Anita gupta mam .

Thank you so much mam.Thanks a lot

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,
review:
Dr Anita came as a blessing in our lives. I visited her for my high risk pregnancy care and delivery. She is a highly experienced doctor but extremely down to earth. She is very approachable even at odd hours...What an attitude! I must say. Visited her in 3rd month of my high risk pregnancy and I am more than satisfied with the guidance she gave. She made the overall journey very easy with an intensive care.  We felt home throughout our stay with La Femme as everything was personally taken care by Dr Anita. She ensured no one troubled us with unnecessary things at the hospital.

In this era where it is almost impossible to trust doctors, Dr Anita is a blessing. She helped me selflessly in my hard times and guided us achieve what once looked like a distant dream to us. I would recommended her to one of my friends too and will recommend her to many more. Thanks a lot Anita Ma‚Äôam. This would have been impossible without you. Love you ‚ù§Ô∏è

tags: None
review: I went to her in second month of my pregnancy after consulting 3 doctors on a friends recommendation AND after 3 months of my delivery, I can say  I made the best decision of  consulting Dr Anita . Dr . Anita Gupta is someone who is extremely calm and positive. She is highly approachable and I am really grateful that she was open to taking calls even at 2 in the night if there appeared to be a problem. In a world where it has become difficult to trust hospitals and doctors, Dr Anita is someone whom you can trust and believe. Strongly recommend her as a gynaecologist üôÇ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: She is a blessing and i recommended her to all my friends who were equally satisfied with Dr. Anita Gupta. She is understanding and super friendly for she told me one thing that she is a channel for us through God when I hugged and said a Thank you to her. I‚Äôll never forget that..
reply_text: Thank you for the kind words, Emma

review:
I had a wonderful experience with Dr anita gupta during my second pregnancy and delivery. it was a high risk pregnancy but only because of her my journey was smooth.
she guided me very well throughout my pregnancy.
she is very understanding and was always available to listen all my problems and use to reply instantly even at odd timings.
thankyou so much doctor for your constant support.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: If anyone is to be given the credit after Lord for me being a Mother is Dr.,Anita Gupta. Being a woman she understood me completely and was very supportive throughout the treatment. I conceived after 2 months of visiting her. Not only me but she also helped two of my other friends longing to be mothers. She is too good and too sweet. God bless you always Dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: *** ** *** **** ** * ** ***** ** ****..she is so active n friendly i llve her as an individual. Today also wen i ask something on phone she actively replies...in detail ...for any query even for my work related questionare she always helps me...i hv known her since 2014 its a long tym bt she always keeps in touch with her patients and revert back with a good smile on her face like always in her busy schedule

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

I loved the way she guided me throughout my pregnancy and gave me my bundle of joy..She is an awesome doctor and I would like to recommend her to all. I simply love herü§óü§ó

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: January 2021, I had a laproscopic myomectomy surgery at Fortis La Femme, GK2. I was fortunate enough that I had considered Dr. Anita Gupta for this pivotal surgery. I don't have enough words to express my gratitude to Her. She is a professional but at same time friendly & compassionate. She not only diagnosed correctly with minimum tests but helped me mentally to prepare for the very first surgery of my life. It took quite a lot of time to perform the surgery as it turned out to bit more complex but may be Almighty has chosen Dr. Anita Gupta for me. Her vast experience & skill helped me to get rid from multiple Fibroids. In fact all the Hospital staffs specially the Nurses at Fortis La Femme were so caring; they not only ensured best care but also pampered me with best attention & mental support. Thank you Doctor... You are a true saviour, you are God sent 'Angel' to me.üôè

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: It is always very hard to find a good n expert doctor cos u r to handover urself to him/her. But i feel myself lucky as i found Dr. Anita Gupta for my surgery of laparoscopic myomectomy. She is very experienced and an expert surgeon. I didn‚Äôt get any complication after it and my recovery was too fast to explain. I highly recommend her for all gynae problems as she listens to u n explain everything very calmly nd honestly. I really appreciate her from my heart. May god bless her with good health nd long life.
